vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
συνᾱλίζω,
aorist
__A συνήλισα [Refs 5th c.BC+]:—bring together, collect, assemble, τινας [Refs 5th c.BC+]:—passive, come together, assemble, [Refs 5th c.BC+]; of things, τὸ πλεῖστον ἐκ τοῦ μυελοῦ σ. [Refs 5th c.BC+]
vocabInfos.shortDef: to be made captive together with assemble
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
to be made captive together with assemble
to convene, assemble, collect
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
1) 同吃 (重點在團契)
2) 聚集, 召集
2) 與...在一起 (徒 1:4)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
1) 同吃 (重点在团契)
2) 聚集, 召集
2) 与...在一起 (徒 1:4)
vocabInfos._vi_Definition: họp mặt với nhau; họp lại với; nhóm lại với
